title: How Sarah J. Maas Redefined Young Adult and Romantasy Fiction
description: Sarah J. Maas revolutionised fantasy fiction by blending epic world-building with emotionally rich romance, giving rise to the explosively popular "romantasy" genre. Her powerful heroines, complex relationships, and genre-bending narratives have redefined what young adult and fantasy fiction can be—creating a global fanbase and inspiring a new generation of authors and readers alike.
author: Salma
